original_text: God has stopped me so that I cannot move forward. He has made my path dark so that I cannot see the way to go. God has stopped me
korean_text: 그가 내 길을 막아 지나가지 못하게 하시고 내 앞길에 어둠을 두셨으며

sentences.original_text: so that I cannot move forward
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 앞으로 나아갈 수 없다

sentences.original_text: He has made my path dark
so that I cannot see the way to go
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 갈 길을 볼 수 없다
